name: I Wanna Be The Sherlock
description:
Pitch

Arcade game about arresting evil people.

Story

You are Sharlock, one of the best detectives in the world. Your mission is to arrest much pleople as you can before the time goes out. To achieve that you will have to check the possible weapons of the suspects and find the one which coincides with the evidences.

Controls

Click to select the circle with the duplicated weapon.

R to retry.

Credits

The game was made in 1 day by 2 people:

Fran Vadillo: Programmer and sounds.

Sandra Valverde: Artist.

We made the game for the #NoShitSherlockJam but we finished 1 hour out of the time limit :(
